metadata.name: Card Probability Randomizer
metadata.author: Card Game Engine
metadata.description: Interactive probability simulator using playing cards. Explore theoretical and experimental probability with customizable experiments.

cards.note: Supports up to 56 cards per deck (52 standard + 4 jokers). Multiple decks can be combined.

instructions.overview: Explore probability concepts using playing cards. Run experiments, track results, and compare experimental probability to theoretical probability. Features an AI tutor to help explain concepts at a 7th-grade math level.
setup: Select how many decks to use (1-8)
Choose which cards to include in your experiment
Select a probability mode or preset experiment
Set the number of cards to flip and trials to run
gameplay: Use presets to explore common probability scenarios
Flip cards manually or run automated simulations
View results in the probability chart
Ask the AI Tutor questions about your results
Use the AI Demo tab to see probability concepts explained visually
instructions.winning: This is an educational tool - there is no win condition. Success is measured by understanding probability concepts!
